alert.note: Alert for Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 8:03PM EDT until August 10 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Maryland, including the following counties: Anne Arundel and Prince Georges. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 803 PM EDT, emergency management reported multiple roads closed due to flooding. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowie... Crofton... Severna Park... Odenton... Parole... Fort Meade... Millersville... Edgewater... Riva... Gambrills... Crownsville... Prince Georges Stadium... Davidsonville... Edgewater Beach... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
